summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Checklist System (Milestone 4). Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI functional but has authentication session persistence issues affecting complete workflow testing.

integration_issues.issue: Login API calls failing with net::ERR_ABORTED after initial login
Today tab selector not found consistently, affecting workflow completion

passed_tests: Backend: All 15 checklist API endpoints (100% success)
Backend: Today's view with pending templates
Frontend: Basic UI components and layout

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Core UI functional, auth session issues prevent complete workflow

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication session persistence issues. The login API calls are failing with net::ERR_ABORTED after initial login, preventing complete workflow testing. Also investigate tab switching functionality in checklists page.
